description.ko: 차가운 금속 도시 질감과 네온 및 홀로그램의 생동감 넘치는 따뜻함이 어우러진 미래 도시의 낭만적인 풍경.
description.en: A romanticized view of a futuristic city, blending cold metallic urban textures with the vibrant warmth of neon and holograms.

prompt: A low-angle cinematic view of a rain-slicked cyberpunk alleyway at midnight, where a massive #FF00FF neon shrine is reflected in hyper-realistic #1A0033 asphalt puddles. Futuristic urban textures of rusted #FF6B35 metal and wet carbon fiber define the dense cityscape. Massive #00FFFF holographic koi fish swim between high-density spires through thick volumetric fog. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing, featuring realistic light spill and global illumination. Sharp focus on individual raindrops falling through neon beams, capturing the digital romance of a futuristic city.
